en.CONTACT_FUNCT: Chief of Bureau in charge of Statistics
en.CONTACT_MAIL: No. 788 Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Boeng Trabek, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
en.CONTACT_ORGANISATION: Ministry of Social Affairs, Veterans and Youth Rehabilitation
en.DATA_COMP: The indictor is computed by dividing the number of poor and vulnerable people receiving emergency social services to the total number of poor and vulnerable people and multiply by 100.
en.INST_MANDATE: Ministry of Social Affairs, Veterans and Youth Rehabilitation
en.SDG_GOAL: 1. End poverty in all its forms everywhere
en.SDG_INDICATOR: 1.3.1 Proportion of poor and vulnerable people receiving emergency social services
en.SDG_SERIES_DESCR: 1.3.1 Proportion of poor population receiving social assistance cash benefit [1.3.1] (SI_COV_POOR)
en.SDG_TARGET: 1.3 Implement the national support system social protection and measures various throughout country and decision to has made a lot of sense coverage of this system to the poor and vulnerable people By the year 2030
en.STAT_CONC_DEF: Population living below the national poverty line and people who are unable to cope with the crisis or are at high risk of crisis ) Receiving first aid services among the total poor and vulnerable

indicator_name: សមាមាត្រនៃប្រជាជនដែលរស់នៅក្នុងគ្រួសារដែលមានលទ្ធភាពទទួលបានសេវាកម្មមូលដ្ឋាន
